mapper.select:
select t.* from (select (@rownum := @rownum + 1) as rownum,t1.* from ( select org_user.id as id, org_user.account as account, IFNULL(org_user.nickname,'/') as nickName, (case org_user.sex when '0' then '男' when '1' then '女' when '男' then '男' when '女' then '女' else '/' end) as sex, IFNULL(org_useraccount.balance,0) as balance, (case org_user.status when '1' then IFNULL(b3.shortname,'/') else '/' end)as shortName, (select count(*) from pub_coupon where lecompanyid=#{leasesCompanyId} and platformtype=1 and target=2 and userid=org_user.id and couponstatus=0 and status=1) as validCoupon, (select COUNT(org_userexpenses.id) from org_userexpenses where org_userexpenses.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_userexpenses.userid = org_user.id and org_userexpenses.detailtype='0') as balanceCount, (select COUNT(org_userexpenses.id) from org_userexpenses where org_userexpenses.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_userexpenses.userid = org_user.id and (org_userexpenses.detailtype='0' or org_userexpenses.detailtype='1')) as dealCount, (select count(*) from pub_coupon where lecompanyid=#{leasesCompanyId} and platformtype=1 and target=2 and userid=org_user.id and status=1) as couponCount from org_user inner join ( select org_user.id,org_user.account from org_user inner join ( select org_organ.id,t2.shortname from org_organ,(
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ, ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} ) t4 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = t4.organid
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ_company_ref,org_organ where org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id
) t2 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.creditcode = t2.creditcode ) t3 on (org_user.organid = t3.id)
where org_user.status = 1 and org_user.usertype = 0
and org_user.organid IN ( select organ.id from org_organ organ where organ.status = 1 and organ.creditcode = ( select org_organ.creditcode from org_organ where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = #{organId} ) )
UNION select org_user.id,org_user.account from org_user, (select t6.account,t6.id,t6.createtime from (select org_user.account,org_user.id,org_useraccount.createtime from org_user,org_useraccount where org_user.id = org_useraccount.userid and org_useraccount.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_useraccount.status = 1 order by org_useraccount.createtime desc) t6 group by t6.account) t7, (select org_user.account,t3.shortname from org_user inner join ( select org_organ.id,t2.shortname from org_organ,(
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ, ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} ) t4 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = t4.organid
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ_company_ref,org_organ where org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id
) t2 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.creditcode = t2.creditcode ) t3 on (org_user.organid = t3.id) where org_user.status != 1 and org_user.usertype = 0 ) t5 where org_user.usertype = 0 and t7.account = t5.account and org_user.id = t7.id
) b1 on (org_user.id = b1.id) left join ( select org_organ.id,b2.shortname from org_organ,( select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ_company_ref,org_organ where org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id ) b2 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.creditcode = b2.creditcode ) b3 on (org_user.organid = b3.id) left join org_useraccount on (org_user.id = org_useraccount.userid and org_useraccount.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_useraccount.status = 1) where org_user.usertype = 0
and org_user.id = #{userId}
order by balance desc) t1, (select @rownum := 0) r ) t
where t.rownum > #{iDisplayStart} and t.rownum <= (#{iDisplayStart} + #{iDisplayLength})

select org_user.id as id,org_user.account as text from org_user, (select org_organ.id from org_organ, (
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ, ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} ) t3 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = t3.organid
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ_company_ref,org_organ where org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id
) t1 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.creditcode = t1.creditcode) t2 where org_user.status = 1 and org_user.usertype = 0 and org_user.organid = t2.id
and org_user.account like "%"#{nameAccount}"%"
UNION select org_user.id as id,org_user.account as text from org_user, (select t5.account,t5.id,t5.createtime from (select org_user.account,org_user.id,org_useraccount.createtime from org_user,org_useraccount where org_user.id = org_useraccount.userid and org_useraccount.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_useraccount.status = 1 order by org_useraccount.createtime desc) t5 group by t5.account) t6, (select org_user.account from org_user, (select org_organ.id from org_organ, (
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ, ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} ) t3 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = t3.organid
select org_organ.creditcode,org_organ.shortname from org_organ_company_ref,org_organ where org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id
) t1 where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.creditcode = t1.creditcode) t2 where org_user.status != 1 and org_user.usertype = 0 and org_user.organid = t2.id ) t4 where org_user.usertype = 0 and t6.account = t4.account and org_user.id = t6.id
and org_user.account like "%"#{nameAccount}"%"

choose.when:
select org_organ.id as id,org_organ.shortname as text from org_organ where org_organ.status=1 and org_organ.id IN ( SELECT le_roledataauthority.dynamicid as organid FROM le_roledataauthority, le_roleuser, le_user WHERE le_roledataauthority.status=1 and le_roleuser.status=1 and le_user.status=1 and le_user.id = le_roleuser.userid and le_roleuser.roleid = le_roledataauthority.roleid and le_user.account=#{account} and le_user.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} )
and org_organ.shortname like "%"#{shortName}"%"
group by org_organ.id

mapper.select: select GROUP_CONCAT(city SEPARATOR ',') from pub_cityaddr where id in (select distinct ps.city from pub_sendrules ps,le_accountrules oa where ps.city=oa.city and ps.leasescompanyid=#{lecompanyid} and oa.leasescompanyid=#{lecompanyid} and ps.vehicletype=0 and ps.platformtype=1 and ps.rulesstate='0' and oa.rulesstate='0' and ps.status=1 and oa.status=1 )
